title: bluetooth
extract: Bluetooth is defined as being a short-range radio technology (or wirelesstechnology) aimed at simplifying communications among Internet devices and between devices and the Internet. It also aims to simplify data synchronization between Internet devices and other computers.
extract_html: Bluetooth is defined as being a short-range radio technology (or wirelesstechnology) aimed at simplifying communications among Internet devices and between devices and the Internet. It also aims to simplify data synchronization between Internet devices and other computers.
